name: 3rd European Food Chemistry Conference
content: Food Chemistry Congress 2022 May 25 - May 26, 2022 | Montreal, Canada Conference Series LLC Ltd welcomes you to attend the 3rdEuropean Food Chemistry Congress to be held in Montreal, Canada on May 25 - May 26, 2022\. The theme for the conference this year is Investigating the Interrelationships of Food and Human Health.
